text: Ok, how do i create a template, that would be applied to all of the dynamic pages?

to give you context, this is a test run i have been working on. <http://shelbyyachtsales-3453372.hs-sites.com/brokerage> this is a page with a roughly made listing module i created on it. but i can not create a new dynamic page based on the module listings. so then i made a dynamic page that contains the page links <http://shelbyyachtsales-3453372.hs-sites.com/brokerage_pages>.
i feel this isnt the best workflow, however if it is, my real question is the front end design of each hub listing page. <http://shelbyyachtsales-3453372.hs-sites.com/yachts/44066-2901378>
can i still get in on this?
